column5: Ask about our discounts for mid-week or week long stays! We have offered our home to guests for 8 years and only receive top reviews Our home was built in 1886 and is a 1900 Storm Survivor. We are centrally located in the heart of the Lost Bayou Historic District and are 7 blocks to the beach and approximately 7 blocks to the Historic Strand District.
column8: Award Winning 1886 Family Home Close To Beach
